DOC.brief_summary: The rationale for the study is to better understand the dynamics of skin microflora following skin barrier disruption in an adult dermatitis model. The results from this study will provide insights in the complex interaction between skin microbiome and epidermis under normal and disease conditions
DOC.criteria: Healthy Subjects with Fitzpatrick Skin Types I, II or III Subjects with visible skin disease, tattoos, skin condition, or abnormal skin color
